meanings.sent1: I have two galliums in my hand.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the properties of galliums in the lab.
meanings.sent3: The galliums decided to have a party in the periodic table.
meanings.sent4: The galliums shone like tiny silver beads under the microscope.
meanings.sent5: The teacher showed the class a picture of galliums to help them remember.

meanings.definition: Galliums: a metallic element with symbol Ga and atomic number 31
meanings.sent1: The factory produced galliums for electronic devices.
meanings.sent2: Galliums are used in some types of solar panels.
meanings.sent3: The galliums in the periodic table had a dance-off with other elements.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like galliums in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The jewelry was made of shining galliums that caught everyone's attention.
